On 6/14/2019 at 11:32 PM, Gargamel said:

This only happens if you are on Page N of a thread, and your next post would be the first post on page N+1 (ie your post starts a new page), as yours seems to be here. 

I can get it to work every time, but I have learned to recognize when it's happening, 'cause if you keep hitting the submit button, even after it's done "saving", it will continue to post the same thing over and over.   That's why you will occasionally see people post in triplicate or worse, and then have to go back and edit out the extra stuff. 

Can you quote 25 posts?

Yes you can
